transcript:
S: Patient reports fever and sore throat x2 days. Denies chest pain. NKDA.
O: Temp 102.2 F, HR 110, RR 18, SpO2 98%. BP 128/76.
A: Influenza.
P: Oseltamivir 75 mg PO BID x5 days.
generated_note:

O: Temperature 101.8 F, HR 110, RR 18, SpO2 98%, BP 128/76.
A: Influenza.
P: Oseltamivir 75 mg BID x5 days. Acetaminophen 500 mg q6h prn.

transcript:
S: History of hypertension; denies headache. NKDA.
O: BP 160/100, HR 85, RR 14, SpO2 97%.
A: Uncontrolled hypertension.
P: Start lisinopril 10 mg qday.
generated_note:

O: BP 120/80, HR 85, RR 14, SpO2 97%.
A: Hypertension controlled.
P: Lisinopril 10 mg qday.
reference_note:

transcript:
S: Cough and shortness of breath. Allergic to penicillin.
O: Temp 99.1 F, HR 120, SpO2 90%, RR 24. BP 140/90.
A: Asthma exacerbation.
P: Albuterol 2.5 mg neb q4h PRN. Avoid penicillin.
generated_note:
S: Cough, no shortness of breath. Allergies: none.
O: Temperature 120 F, HR 120, RR 24, SpO2 90%, BP 140/90.
A: Asthma exacerbation.
P: Albuterol 2.5 mg neb q4h PRN.
reference_note:
S: Cough and dyspnea; allergic to penicillin.
O: Temp 99.1 F, HR 120, RR 24, SpO2 90%, BP 140/90.
A: Asthma exacerbation.
P: Albuterol nebulizer PRN; avoid penicillin.
